project_descr: The project aims to contribute a Human Development perspective to the quality of public discourse, the design of policies, and the design of institutional capacity development strategies (including national programmes).

outputs.output_descr: The policy and advocacy programmes are to be achieved through: policy engagement, programming, human development research, strategic communications, and building strategic partnerships.
